title: McCree is bullshit.
body:
Why does a character with good close-medium range DPS (And OK long range, although not as strong as beta) have *hard CC*? Why does he have the ability to just dump out all his ammo for free burst that'll kill other offensive/support/defense heroes? Tanks too if he can aim it up slightly and dump eight rounds into their fuckin' skull.

There's a reason he's S-rank. Even a scrub McCree can just high noon out a play of the game like a Bastion. Not sure why people give him a free pass but Bastion is "WE MUST NERF REEEEEEEEEEE"
